body.p: The Information Security Management Team assembles in a weekly Roadmap Meeting to discuss work in process and prospective work. Changes to existing processes, systems, applications are also reviewed and discussed. Items that are approved, are tracked at a high level in these meetings. Work is tracked more closely through the company ticketing system.

Ticketed items are reviewed/assigned by either the Development Lead or Project Manager. If the work is planned to be included as part of a release, all tickets must be signed off by a tester. After the release, the tickets are reviewed in production and closed.
